channel.title: Pi high scores help!

item.title: Pi high scores help!
item.dc:creator: @Jean_Valjean Jean Valjean
item.description:
@Jean_Valjean wrote:

I have just added high scores to my pi source but it ranks total level.

i need help to make it rank pk points here the code that i think that needs to be edited

getPA().sendFrame126("Rank “+(i+1)+”: "+rankPpl[i]+ "- Total Level: " +ranks[i], 6402+i);

Read full topic
